note.p: Daughter of John Gray of Wembley Park, Middlesex. Married George Butler, the headmaster of Harrow School, in 1818.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archive: Public Record Office HO107/1635/507/16)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 19 June 2011)
Weld Chapel baptisms (London Metropolitan Archives DRO/040/G/001)
